name: mClinic
title: The next generation healthcare platform
description: mClinic is a next-generation platform connecting patients with doctors anywhere in the world using modern technology. mClinic's platform provides doctors with a dashboard to easily manage their daily workflows including managing and attending appointments, keeping records of patient's vitals and much more. Patients can easily book appointments using the platform and have a one-to-one video calling session with the doctor.
stack: Node.js, Express.js and WebSockets for Video Calling.
roles: - Building Doctor and Patient Frontend by referring to UI mockups
- Integrating AWS Amplify and GraphQL API in the web application
- Building Video Calling functionality from scratch using Node.js, Express.js and Websockets

name: JustJobsNG
title: Nigeria's leading Job Portal and recruitment platform
description: JustJobsNg is Nigeria's leading job portal and recruitment platform that serves over 100,000+ job seekers and 1500 recruiters every month. JustJobsNG's recruitment platform provides recruiters with an efficient way to find and hire the right candidate for the role.
stack: - PHP and Node.js Microservices for Backend
- Python and Node for Web Scrapers
- Apache Server and Nginx as a reverse proxy
- React.js, ReactStrap and Bootswatch library for Frontend
roles: - Rebuilding the job portal from scratch using PHP
- Building Web Scrapers using Python and Node.js
- Building Internal Admin Panel from scratch using MERN Stack
- Integrating internal and third-party APIs in the web app
- Configuration of Version Control System and CI/CD
- Creating webhooks and monitoring server uptime using Uptime Monitor
